title: Bleach: Can’t Fear Your Own World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Shounen   Supernatural

description: Hisagi must throw himself into a new fight as the mystery that Kaname Tōsen left behind resurfaces. The story reveals more details about the four Noble Houses, the Soul King, Arrancar and Fullbringers.>
